text: Ajou is a former commune in the Department of Eure in Normandy. It is located in northern France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Mesnil-en-Ouche.Arrêté préfectoral 9 December 2015 ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Eure department ==References== Category:Former communes of Eure
title: Ajou
